p:
PD susceptibility genes were derived from our own MAGMA analyses and a study attempting to prioritise genes in PD using TWAS and colocalisation analyses (Supplementary Table 1 in ref.
26 ). The genes comprising these lists are available in Supplementary Table 5. In the case of MAGMA, only those genes passing genome-wide significance ( p < 2.82 × 10 -6) were used. In the case of TWAS/coloc, only those eQTL-gene associations found within dorsolateral prefrontal cortex tissue, which were both TWAS and coloc hits (as defined in ref.
26 ) were used.
